title: Angular Component Options Schema
description: Creates a new generic component definition in the given or default project.

application.description: Application that the new component will belong to
application.x-prompt: What application will the component be under?

domain.description: Name of the domain to create the component in
domain.x-prompt: What is the domain you are creating the comopnent in?

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component?

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.
prefix.x-prompt: What is the prefix to apply to generated selectors?

displayBlock.description: Specifies if the style will contain `:host { display: block; }`.

viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new component.

changeDetection.description: The change detection strategy to use in the new component.

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

x-prompt.message: Which stylesheet format would you like to use?

testType.description: The type of test file to create

x-prompt.message: What type of test file do you want to create?

items.label: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.
create a "spec.ts" test file for the new component that uses TestbBed
create a "spec.ts" test file for the new component that does not use TestbBed.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this component.
